He wants to storm the building through the sewers. I said, No, well negotiate. Turned out the ELN didnt negotiate, so they put out a kill order. They stormed the basement, and what did they find. They find it empty. Nick had ignored my direct order and carried out an unauthorized military operation on foreign soil. He saved the lives of a dozen political officers, including my daughter.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: So you gave him a promotion.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Ive never had any cause to regret it. Captain, why was Nick in your apartment last night.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: I dont know.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: You know it was bugged.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: I did, because Nick told me.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Did he tell you he was the one who bugged it. I want you to see something.

Speaker: SHIELD Agent
Line: Who hired you, Batroc.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Is that live.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Yeah, they picked him up last night in a not-so-safe house in Algiers.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Are you saying hes a suspect. Assassination isnt Batrocs line.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: No, its more complicated than that. Batroc was hired anonymously to attack the Lemurian Star and he was contacted by e-mail and paid by wire transfer. And then the money was run through seventeen fictitious accounts, the last one going to a holding company that was registered to a Jacob Veech.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Am I supposed to know who that is.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Not likely. Veech died six years ago. His last address was 14-35 Elmhurst Drive. When I first met Nick his mother lived at 14-37.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Are you saying Fury hired the pirates. Why.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: The prevailing theory was that the hijacking was a cover for the acquisition and sale of classified intelligence. The sale went sour and that led to Nicks death.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: If you really knew Nick Fury youd know thats not true.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Why do you think were talking. See, I took a seat on the Council not because I wanted to but because Nick asked me to, because we were both realists. We knew that despite all the diplomacy and the handshaking and the rhetoric, that to build a really better world sometimes means having to tear the old one down. And that makes enemies. Those people that call you dirty because you got the guts to stick your hands in the mud and try to build something better. And the idea that those people could be happy today, makes me really, really angry. Captain, you were the last one to see Nick alive. I dont think thats an accident, and I dont think you do either. So Im gonna ask again, why was he there.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: He told me not to trust anyone.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: I wonder if that included him.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Im sorry. Those were his last words. Excuse me.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Captain. Somebody murdered my friend and Im gonna find out why. Anyone gets in my way, theyre gonna regret it. Anyone.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Understood.

Line: Operations control.

Line: Confirmed.

Line: Confirmed.

Line: Eyes here. Whatever your op is, bury it. This is Level One. Contact DOT. All traffic lights in the district go red. Shut all runways at BWI, IAD and Reagan. All security cameras in the city go through this monitor, right here. Scan all open sources. Phones, computers, PDAs, whatever. If someone tweets about this guy, I want to know about it.

Speaker: Sharon Carter
Line: With all due respect, If SHIELD is conducting a manhunt for Captain America, we deserve to know why.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Because he lied to us. Captain Rogers has information regarding the death of Director Fury, he refused to share it. As difficult as this is to accept, Captain America is a fugitive from SHIELD.

Line: Stop lying.

Line: I only act like I know everything, Rogers.

Line: I bet you knew Fury hired the pirates, didnt you.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Well, it makes sense. The ship was dirty, Fury needed a way in, so do you.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Im not gonna ask you again.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: I know who killed Fury. Most of the intelligence community doesnt believe he exists, the ones who do call him the Winter Soldier. Hes credited with over two dozen assassinations in the last fifty years.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: So hes a ghost story.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Five years ago I was escorting a nuclear engineer out of Iran, somebody shot out my tires near Odessa. We lost control, went straight over a cliff, I pulled us out, but the Winter Soldier was there. I was covering my engineer, so he shot him straight through me. Soviet slug, no rifling. Bye-bye bikinis.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Yeah, I bet you look terrible in them now.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Going after him is a dead end. I know, Ive tried. Like you said, hes a ghost story.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Well, lets find out what the ghost wants.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Nick Fury was murdered in cold blood. To any reasonable person, that would make him a martyr, not a traitor.

Speaker: Councilman Rockwell
Line: You know what makes him a traitor. Hiring a mercenary to hijack his own ship.

Speaker: Councilman Singh
Line: Nick Fury used your friendship to coerce this council into delaying Project Insight. A project he knew would expose his own illegal operations. At best, he lied to you. At worst.

Line: Are you calling for my resignation. Ive got a pen and paper right here.

Line: That discussion can be tabled for a later time.

Line: But you do want to have a discussion.

Line: Weve already had it, Mr Secretary. This council moves to immediately reactivate Project Insight. If you want to say something snappy, now would be a good time.

Line: First rule of going on the run is, dont run, walk.

Line: If I run in these shoes, theyre gonna fall off.

Line: The drive has a Level Six homing program, so as soon as we boot up SHIELD will know exactly where we are.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Uh.about nine minutes from. Now. Fury was right about that ship, somebodys trying to hide something. This drive is protected by some sort of AI, it keeps rewriting itself to counter my commands.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Can you override it.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: The person who developed this is slightly smarter than me. Slightly. Im gonna try running a tracer. This is a program that SHIELD developed to track hostile malware, so if we cant read the file, maybe we can find out where it came from.

Line: Can I help you guys with anything.

Line: Oh, no. My fiancé was just helping me with some honeymoon destinations.

Line: Shh, relax. Got it. You know it.

Line: I used to. Lets go. Standard tac-team. Two behind, to across, two coming straight at us. If they make us, Ill engage, you hit the south escalator to the metro.

Line: Do it.

Line: Well, thats alright, you just make something up.

Line: I dont know. The truth is a matter of circumstances, its not all things to all people all the time. And neither am I.

Line: I am not a recording, Fräulein. I may not be the man I was when the Captain took me prisoner in 1945, but I am.

Line: Do you know this thing.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Arnim Zola was a German scientist who worked for the Red Skull. Hes been dead for years.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: First correction, I am Swiss. Second, look around you. I have never been more alive. In 1972 I received a terminal diagnosis. Science could not save my body, my mind, however, that was worth saving on two hundred thousand feet of data banks. You are standing in my brain.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: How did you get here.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: Invited.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: It was Operation Paperclip after World War II. SHIELD recruited German scientists with strategic value.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: They thought I could help their cause. I also helped my own.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: HYDRA died with the Red Skull.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: Cut off one head, two more shall take its place.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Prove it.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: Accessing archive. HYDRA was founded on the belief that humanity could not be trusted with its own freedom. What we did not realize, was that if you try to take that freedom, they resist. The war taught us much. Humanity needed to surrender its freedom willingly. After the war, SHIELD was founded and I was recruited. The new HYDRA grew. A beautiful parasite inside SHIELD. For seventy years HYDRA has been secretly feeding crisis, reaping war. And when history did not cooperate, history was changed.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Thats impossible, SHIELD would have stopped you.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: Accidents will happen. HYDRA created a world so chaotic that humanity is finally ready to sacrifice its freedom to gain its security. Once the purification process is complete, HYDRAs new world order will arise. We won, Captain. Your death amounts to the same as your Life; a zero sum. As I was saying.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Whats on this drive.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: Project Insight requires insight. So I wrote an algorithm.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: What kind of algorithm. What does it do.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: The answer to your question is fascinating. Unfortunately, you shall be too dead to hear it.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Steve, we got a bogey. Short range ballistic. 30 seconds tops.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Who fired it.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: S.H.I.E.L.D.

Speaker: Dr. Arnim Zola
Line: I am afraid I have been stalling, Captain. Admit it, its better this way. Were both of us.out of time.

Speaker: Brock Rumlow
Line: Call in the asset.

Speaker: Renata
Line: Im going to go, Mr Pierce. You need anything before I leave.

Line: No. Uh.its fine, Renata, you can go home.

Line: So, the question is: who in SHIELD could launch a domestic missile strike.

Line: So was Jasper Sitwell.

Line: So, the real question is: how do the two most wanted people in Washington kidnap a SHIELD officer in broad daylight.

Line: The answer is: you dont.

Line: Whats this.

Line: Doesnt sound much of a problem to me.

Line: Really. Cause shes killing my back. Look, this isnt the place to talk about it. This is a nice pin.

Line: What do you want.

Line: Youre gonna go around the corner, to your right. Theres a grey car, two spaces down. You and I are gonna take a ride.

Line: And why would I do that.

Line: Never heard of it.

Line: I knew him.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Your work has been a gift to mankind. You shaped the century, and I need you to do it one more time. Society is at a tipping point between order and chaos. Tomorrow morning were gonna give it a push. But, if you dont do your part, I cant do mine, and HYDRA cant give the world the freedom it deserves.

Speaker: Bucky Barnes
Line: But I knew him.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Prep him.

Line: Hes been out of cryo-freeze too long.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Then wipe him and start over.

Line: This man declined the Nobel Peace Prize. He said, Peace wasnt an achievement, it was a responsibility. See, its stuff like this that gives me trust issues.

Line: We have to stop the launch.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: I dont think the Councils accepting my calls anymore.

Line: We need to breach those carriers and replace their targeting blades with our own.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: We have to assume everyone aboard those carriers is HYDRA. We need to get pass them, insert the server blades, and maybe, just maybe, we can salvage whats left.

Line: SHIELD had nothing to do with it.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: And how many paid the price before you did.

Line: Look, I didnt know about Barnes.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Even if you have, would you have told me. Or would you have compartmentalized that too. SHIELD, HYDRA, it all goes.

Speaker: Maria Hill
Line: Hes right.

Speaker: Sam Wilson
Line: Dont look at me. I do what he does, just slower.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: Well. Looks like youre giving the orders now, Captain.

Line: We looked for you after. My folks wanted to give you a ride to the cemetery.

Line: I know, Im sorry. I just.kind of wanted to be alone.

Speaker: Bucky Barnes
Line: How was it.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: It was okay. Shes next to Dad.

Speaker: Bucky Barnes
Line: I was gonna ask.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: I know what youre gonna say, Buck, I just.

Line: We can put the couch cushions on the floor like when we were kids. Itll be fun. All you gotta do is shine my shoes, maybe take out the trash. Come on.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Thank you, Buck, but I can get by on my own.

Speaker: Bucky Barnes
Line: The thing is, you dont have to. Im with you to the end of the line, pal.

Line: Hes gonna be there, you know.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: I know.

Line: Look, whoever he used to be, the guy he is now, I dont think hes the kind you save. Hes the kind you stop.

Line: Well, he might not give you a choice. He doesnt know you.

Line: He will. Gear up, its time.

Line: You gonna wear that.

Line: No. If youre gonna fight a war, you gotta wear a uniform.

Line: Sadly, SHIELD cant control everything.

Speaker: Councilman Rockwell

Line: This facility is biometrically controlled, and these will give you unrestricted access.

Line: So wheres he been.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Excuse us.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: I know the road hasnt exactly been smooth, and some of you would have gladly kicked me out of the car along the way. Finally were here, and the world should be grateful.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Attention, all SHIELD agents. This is Steve Rogers. Youve heard a lot about me over the last few days, some of you were even ordered to hunt me down. But I think its time you know the truth. SHIELD is not what we thought it was, its been taken over by HYDRA. Alexander Pierce is their leader. The STRIKE and Insight crew are HYDRA as well. I dont know how many more, but I know theyre in the building. They could be standing right next to you. They almost have what they want: absolute control. They shot Nick Fury and it wont end there. If you launch those Helicarriers today, HYDRA will be able to kill anyone that stands in their way, unless we stop them. I know Im asking a lot, but the price of freedom is high, it always has been, and its a price Im willing to pay. And if Im the only one, then so be it. But Im willing to bet Im not.

Speaker: Sam Wilson
Line: Did you write that down first, or was it off the top of your head.

Speaker: Councilman Rockwell
Line: You smug son of a bitch.

Line: Arrest him.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: I guess Ive got the floor.

Speaker: Brock Rumlow
Line: Preempt the launch sequence. Send those ships up now. Is there a problem.

Line: Im.

Line: Is there a problem.

Line: Im sorry, sir. Im not gonna launch those ships. Captains orders.

Line: You picked the wrong side, Agent.

Line: Depends on where youre standing.

Line: Close the bay door. Close the bay door now. Close the bay door.

Line: Theyre initiating launch.

Line: You okay.

Line: Not if it was your switch.

Line: Dont worry, companys coming.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Did you get my flowers. Im glad youre here, Nick.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: Really. Cause I thought you had me killed.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: You know how the game works.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: So why make me head of SHIELD.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Cause you were the best and the most ruthless person I ever met.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: I did what I did to protect people.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: Our enemies are your enemies, Nick. Disorder, war. Its just a matter of time before a dirty bomb goes off in Moscow, or an EMP fries Chicago. Diplomacy. Holding action, a band-aid. And you know where I learned that; Bogota. You didnt ask, you just did what had to be done. I can bring order to the lives of seven billion people by sacrificing twenty million. Its the next step, Nick, if you have the courage to take it.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: No, I have the courage not to.

Speaker: SHIELD Computer
Line: Retinal scanner active.

Speaker: Alexander Pierce
Line: You dont you think we wiped your clearance from the system.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: I know you erased my password, probably deleted my retinal scan, but if you want to stay ahead of me, Mr Secretary. You need to keep both eyes open.

Line: Alpha Level confirmed. Encryption code accepted. Safeguards removed.

Line: Charlie Carriers forty-five degrees off the port bow. Six minutes.

Line: Yeah, Im here. Im still on the Helicarrier. Where are you.

Line: Falcon.

Line: Done. And its trending.

Line: Were on it, stay where you are. Not an option.

Line: 41st floor. 41st.

Line: You know me.

Line: No, I dont.

Line: Bucky, youve known me your whole life. Your name is James Buchanan Barnes.

Line: Shut up.

Line: Im not gonna fight you. Youre my friend.

Line: Youre my mission. Youre my mission.

Line: Then finish it. Cause Im with you to the end of the line.

Line: On your left.

Line: Do you solemnly swear to tell the truth the whole truth and nothing but the truth.

Line: I do.

Line: Why havent we yet heard from Captain Rogers.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: I dont know what there is left left for him to say. I think the wreck in the middle of the Potomac made his point fairly eloquently.

Speaker: Committee General
Line: Well, he could explain how this countrys expected to maintain its national security now that he and you have laid waste to our intelligence apparatus.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: HYDRA was selling you lies, not intelligence.

Speaker: Committee General
Line: Many of which you seem to have had a personal hand in telling.

Speaker: Scudder
Line: Agent, you should know that there are some on this committee who feel, given your service record, both for this country and against it, that you belong in a penitentiary, not mouthing off on Capitol Hill.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Youre not gonna put me in a prison. Youre not gonna put any of us in a prison. You know why.

Speaker: Scudder
Line: Do enlighten us.

Speaker: Natasha Romanoff
Line: Because you need us. Yes, the world is a vulnerable place, and yes, we helped make it that way. But were also the ones best qualified to defend it. So if you want to arrest me, arrest me. Youll know where to find me.

Line: So, youve experienced this sort of thing before.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: You get used to it.

Speaker: Nick Fury
Line: Alright then. Anybody asks for me, tell them they can find me right here.

Line: No.

Speaker: Steve Rogers
Line: Not staying here.

Line: I blew all my covers, I gotta go figure out a new one.

Line: Im counting on it. That thing you asked for, I called in a few favors from Kiev. ] Will you do me a favor. Call that nurse.

Line: And youre not a SHIELD agent.

Line: What was her name again.

Line: Sharon. Shes nice. Be careful, Steve. You might not want to pull on that thread.

Line: Youre going after him.

Line: HYDRA, SHIELD, two sides of a coin thats no longer currency. What we have is worth more than any of them ever knew. Weve only scratched the surface and already. There are other facilities doing HYDRAs good work around the world. Well feed them to Captain America and his colorful friends. Keep them off our scent.

Speaker: List
Line: What about the volunteers.

Speaker: Baron Wolfgang von Strucker
Line: The dead will be buried so deep their own ghosts wont be able to find them.

Speaker: List
Line: And the survivors.

Speaker: Baron Wolfgang von Strucker
Line: The twins. Sooner or later they will meet the twins. Its not a world of spies anymore, not even a world of heroes. This is the age of miracles, doctor. Theres nothing more horrifying than a miracle.
